content: :wave: Howdy. I'm curious what happened to the EOB.hospitalization field in the R3->R4 migration? The field is no longer present, but I don't see it listed in the mapping (http://hl7.org/fhir/explanationofbenefit-version-maps.html). Anyone know what's up?
@Karl M. Davis You can supply that as ExplanationOfBenefit.supportinginfo with a .category.code="hospitalized" and a .timingPeriod of when they were in.
